items.title: Arabic Fairytale — Make a Wish
items.excerpt: A luxurious digital collection inspired by the warmth of Middle Eastern nights — where desert dusk, emerald treasures, and the glow of lantern light blend into soft cinematic magic. A gentle world of elegance, mystery, and feminine grace woven into every frame.

items.title: Aya in Paris — A Visual Journey
items.excerpt: A dreamy Parisian visual story shaped through soft light, vintage charm, and Aya’s quiet magic. From morning cafés to sunset gardens and the poetic stillness of Versailles — a celebration of feminine elegance, nostalgia, and ethereal beauty.
